titles.title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require congressional approval of certain actions, and for other purposes.
To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require congressional approval of certain actions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill requires congressional approval to list, remove from a list, or change the status of any endangered species or threatened species.
